p: After LASV, Lujo virus is the second known to date human pathogenic arenavirus of Africa. Among the five identified cases in 2008, four died; the fifth case was treated with ribavirin early after onset of clinical disease and survived. It has been only reported from a few patients from Zambia and from a subsequent nosocomial outbreak in South Africa (Briese etÂ al. 2009). A natural reservoir has not yet been identified.
